title: I have found one positive effect of toxic players...
body:
When you get a good team that stays positive, you appreciate it so much more.  Here's a thank you to everyone who keeps it friendly when mistakes are made.  You are the part of the community that makes this game worth playing.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: This is how i gain Freelo, just do what Sky says and just suck everyone off, you see someone got a kill? Just type in chat "Great job!", someone on your team died when you also died, "My bad, im sorry". Shit like this is how i got an 11 game win streak in ranked! http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=Ajani%20goldenmane {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

> [{quoted}](name=Ajani goldenmane,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=GLxbEmIn,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2016-08-04T22:35:53.508+0000)
>
> This is how i gain Freelo, just do what Sky says and just suck everyone off, you see someone got a kill? Just type in chat "Great job!", someone on your team died when you also died, "My bad, im sorry". Shit like this is how i got an 11 game win streak in ranked! http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=Ajani%20goldenmane {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

DST saves lives

> [{quoted}](name=Fuufs,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=GLxbEmIn,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2016-08-04T22:41:12.326+0000)
>
> DST saves lives

My winning steak ended at 18 wins, but i did climb from Silver V 0LP to Silver I 0LP, so im pretty happy {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
i was once on a winning streak like that too, and then went on a massive series of loss streaks cuz my MMR got too high and everyone except me was just too gud
Learning to do this, it does hold some weight.. It's still very hard to keep one's cool when encountering trolls though. Sigh I hate Hate Hate trolls..

And here I thought you were going to mention how great they are for cleaning drainpipes.

Then again, this isn't the silly section of the boards...
Well, this is tempting to post in M&G. Still, i leave that choice to you
If only there was more of 2 of them.
Without the players you so flippantly call "toxic", this game would have never made it onto the competitive scene.
DotA had made it even with their prison system thingy. Why cant LoL?
